thread.title: A Korean peace deal isn't a new idea, or a simple one

title: A Korean peace deal isn't a new idea, or a simple one
text:
A Korean peace deal isn't a new idea, or a simple one Thursday, April 19, 2018 - 02:05 
The two Koreas, ahead of a leaders’ summit next week, are discussing a peace agreement that could officially end the state of war that has technically lasted since the 1950-53 Korean War ended with an armistice not a treaty.   
The two Koreas, ahead of a leaders’ summit next week, are discussing a peace agreement that could officially end the state of war that has technically lasted since the 1950-53 Korean War ended with an armistice not a treaty.  //reut.rs/2HdCud8
